mapper.sql: SELECT ('WO_') || CASE WHEN LENGTH(workorder_seq.nextval) = 1 THEN '00' || workorder_seq.nextval WHEN LENGTH(workorder_seq.nextval) = 2 THEN '0' || workorder_seq.nextval ELSE '' || workorder_seq.nextval END WO_NO FROM dual
